name: Summon Night: Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi
overview: Summon Night Craft Sword Monogatari: Hajimari no Ishi is an Action RPG developed by Flightplan for the Game Boy Advance. It is the third and final title in the Summon Night spinoff Swordcraft Story series and is a sequel to Summon Night: Swordcraft Story 2. The game was released in Japan in December of 2005. It never received an official English translation due to it being a late-release title for the Advance.
